Description: The Rest on the Flight into Egypt, with a shepherd; the Virgin with the Christ Child and Joseph leaning on a donkey at l, a fountain to right Brush drawing in brown ink, heightened with white, over black chalk, on grey-brown paper
Curator's comments: Piero Boccardo suggested an alternative attribution to Gregorio de' Ferrari. Lit.: A.E. Popham, 'Catalogue of Drawings in the Collection formed by Sir Thomas Phillipps, Bart., F.R.S., now in the possession of his Grandson, T. Fitzroy Phillipps Fenwick of Thirlestaine House, Cheltenham', London, 1935, p. 159, no. 1; P. Boccardo, 'I grandi disegni italiani del Gabinetto Disegni e Stampe di Palazzo Rosso a Genova', Milan, 1999, under no. 62
Bibliographic references: Phillipps-Fenwick 1935 / Catalogue of drawings in the collection of T Fitzroy Phillipps-Fenwick (p.159(1))
